scripts.build:ui: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.deploy:serverless: cd serverless && npm i && sls deploy --config serverless-waf.yml && WEB_ACL_ID=$(echo $(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name $WAF_STACK_NAME --region us-east-1 --query "Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey=='WebACLId'].OutputValue" --output text) >> stack.txt && awk -F "|" '{print $2}' stack.txt) && echo $WEB_ACL_ID && sls deploy --verbose && cd ..
